Class KeyboardInputs

java.lang.Object
KeyboardInputs
public class KeyboardInputs extends Object
This class handles all keyboard inputs for the Air Hockey game.

  • Method Details

    • handleLeftMalletInput

      public double[] handleLeftMalletInput(GameArena mainScreen, Ball leftMallet, double constantSpeed)
      Handles all movements of the left mallet (ball)
      Parameters:
      mainScreen - GameArena object to be used.
      leftMallet - Mallet (ball) to be handled
      constantSpeed - Speed at which the mallet should move
      Returns:
      The last Y and X speed of the mallet respectively

    • handleRightMalletInput

      Parameters:
      mainScreen - GameArena object to be used.
      rightMallet - Mallet (ball) to be handled
      constantSpeed - Speed at which the mallet should move
      Returns:
      The last Y and X speed of the mallet respectively

    • HandleMusicInput

      public void HandleMusicInput(GameArena mainScreen, SoundPlayer soundPlayer, Rectangle musicBox)
      Handles the music button (Rectangle)
      Parameters:
      mainScreen - GameArena object to be used.
      soundPlayer - Soundplayer object to be modified
      musicBox - Rectangle boxs' color to be modified

    • handleCheatInputs

      public double handleCheatInputs(GameArena mainScreen, Cheats cheatEngine, Ball leftMallet, Ball rightMallet, Rectangle table, double originalConstantSpeed)
      Handles all Cheat inputs for the game.
      Parameters:
      mainScreen - GameArena object to be used.
      cheatEngine - CheatEngine object to be used.
      leftMallet - Left mallet properties to be modified.
      rightMallet - Right mallet properties to be modified.
      table - Table properties to be modified.
      originalConstantSpeed - Speed of mallets to be modified.
      Returns:
      New speed of mallets after modifications.
